description: Run unit tests for the logging component.

instructions: Execute the unit tests located in `tests/unit/test_logging.py`.
Use a standard Python test runner like `pytest`.
Ensure the test environment is set up correctly to run these tests.
Capture the output of the test execution.
Analyze the test results to determine if all tests passed.
Report the outcome of the test run, indicating whether all tests passed or if any failures occurred.
constraints: Must use the existing test file `tests/unit/test_logging.py`.
Do not modify the test file or the source code (`src/ai_whisperer/logging.py`).
